argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isatom.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isatom.z | |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isatom.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 4 |  | isatom.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_isat | |- ( K e. D -> ( P e. A <-> ( P e. B /\ .0. C P ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_baibd | |- ( ( K e. D /\ P e. B ) -> ( P e. A <-> .0. C P ) ) |
